meanings.definition: In a manner that is free from any other living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist grew the bacteria axenically in a sterile environment.
meanings.sent2: The plants were grown axenically in a controlled laboratory setting.
meanings.sent3: The petri dish looked lonely with only one axenically grown colony.
meanings.sent4: The laboratory was so clean, it almost felt axenically empty.
meanings.sent5: The fish tank was axenically maintained to ensure the health of the aquatic life.

meanings.definition: Relating to a culture or environment that is completely sterile or devoid of any other organisms.
meanings.sent1: The axenically grown plants were used for research purposes.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician ensured the equipment was axenically clean before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The axenically sealed room felt like a space station.
meanings.sent4: The axenically controlled environment was as pure as a snowflake.
meanings.sent5: The axenically maintained greenhouse was a haven for rare plant species.
